audioText: Le bus passait tous les matins à huit heures devant ma maison.
question: When did the bus pass by the speaker's house?
options: Only on weekdays at eight o'clock
explanation: The text states 'Le bus passait tous les matins à huit heures devant ma maison.' - The bus used to pass every morning at eight o'clock in front of my house. 'Passait' is the imperfect tense indicating a repeated past action.
